_comment: Java 25 Egg for Pterodactyl - Ready for Hytale
name: Java 25 Generic
author: TurboMC
description: Generic Java 25 server egg for Pterodactyl. Designed for Hytale and other Java 25 applications.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

cd /mnt/server || exit 1

echo "========================================"
echo "Java 25 Server Installation"
echo "========================================"

# Check if SERVER_JARFILE is a URL
if [[ "${SERVER_JARFILE}" == http* ]]; then
    echo "Downloading server JAR from: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
    curl -sSL -o server.jar "${SERVER_JARFILE}"
    echo "Download complete!"
else
    echo "SERVER_JARFILE is not a URL. Assuming JAR will be uploaded manually."
    echo "Please upload your server JAR file and name it: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
fi

# Accept EULA if enabled
if [[ "${AUTO_EULA}" == "1" ]] || [[ "${AUTO_EULA}" == "true" ]]; then
    echo "eula=true" > eula.txt
    echo "EULA automatically accepted."
fi

echo "========================================"
echo "Installation complete!"
echo "========================================"

variables.name: Server JAR File
variables.description: The name of the server JAR file or URL to download it from.

variables.name: Server Memory
variables.description: The amount of memory (in MB) to allocate to the server.

variables.name: Java Arguments
variables.description: Additional JVM arguments to pass to Java.

variables.name: Server Arguments
variables.description: Additional arguments to pass to the server JAR.

variables.name: Auto Accept EULA
variables.description: Automatically accept the Minecraft EULA during installation.
